channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mideast conflict looms over US presidential race as Harris, Trump jostle for an edge
item.description: The crisis in the Middle East is looming over the race for the White House as the campaign enters its final weeks

item.title: Surfer dies after being stabbed by swordfish: "Died doing what she loved"
item.description: Giulia Manfrini was surfing in the Mentawai islands when a swordfish "suddenly jumped and struck her in the chest," officials said.

item.title: How cities are breathing new life into their urban rivers
item.description: Of the 3.5 million miles of rivers in the U.S., 50% are too polluted for fishing, boating or swimming, according to American Rivers.

item.title: DR Congo army takes Kalembe town back from M23 rebels, spokesman says
Letters to the Editor: Israel's defeat of Hamas and Hezbollah can bring peace to the region
'Actually busier now': Business picking up for downtown Augusta eateries, but problems linger
2024 election updates: More than 1.5M have voted early in battleground Georgia
item.description: Most polls show Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump neck-and-neck in key states with just about two weeks to go.

item.title: Russia’s Seaborne Crude Shipments Rise to the Highest Since June
Putin's expanded BRICS summit proves he has friends — but risks buckling under its own contradictions
Biden to highlight drug price reductions with New Hampshire visit
item.description: President Biden is visiting New Hampshire Tuesday to tout his health care achievements and put focus on his policy legacy.

item.title: Harvey Weinstein said to have bone marrow cancer
item.description: Disgraced Hollywood movie producer Harvey Weinstein has been diagnosed with bone marrow cancer, according to numerous reports.

item.title: Israel-Gaza-Lebanon live updates: Blinken arrives in Israel for cease-fire push
item.description: Israel continued its operations in Gaza and Lebanon after Hamas leader and Oct. 7, 2023 attack mastermind Yahya Sinwar was killed in a firefight.

item.title: Trump and Harris teams head to court in flurry of pre-election lawsuits
item.description: With two weeks until Election Day, officials say the 2024 race is already the most litigated in history as the Trump and Harris campaigns face off ove...

item.title: Harris holding moderated conversations with Liz Cheney in 3 battleground states
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is doing a series of moderated conversations with former Rep. Liz Cheney in the battleground states of Pennsylvania, Mich...

item.title: Pilot killed in New Mexico airshow crash had given lessons to "Top Gun" cast
item.description: Chuck Coleman, who died in a crash of a small plane during a New Mexico air show, was an accomplished pilot who had given lessons to the cast of a "To...
